title: 【布袋彈】其實是一種散彈槍子彈，違規使用十分致命。香港警察連日來無異於對平民實施開槍謀殺。專業試驗擊碎一切謊言和狡辯。
contents:
In this video we show how much energy a low-velocity beanbag round actually has. This valuable data can give trainees a real respect for these rounds so they deploy them properly and ethically. Some of these ideas came from viewers, I asked them to submit ideas for us to test. This is a rare opportunity to gather important data that viewers wanted to see. This was filmed using a Chronos 1.4 high speed camera. Big thank you to our Patreon supporters.
https://www.patreon.com/ taofledermaus

在這個視頻中，我們展示了低速豆袋圓實際上有多少能量。這些有價值的數據可以讓學員真正尊重這些輪次，以便他們正確和合乎道德地部署它們。其中一些想法來自觀眾，我讓他們提交想法供我們測試。這是收集觀眾希望看到的重要數據的難得機會。這是使用Chronos 1.4高速相機拍攝的。非常感謝我們的Patreon支持者。
https://www.patreon.com/ taofledermaus
